nodes.text: Bill 1979 was a piece of legislation in the Imperial Senate that proposed granting droids the right to vote. Imperial Senator Jar Jar Binks pondered on whether to vote for or against the proposition.

Bill 1979 was first mentioned in a Facebook post on November 2012 for the Star Wars Detours page. The page has since then been taken down in lieu of Detours's postponement after the Disney acquisition of Lucasfilm Ltd.
